column1: Radbug was an Orcs under the command of Shagrat at the Tower of Cirith Ungol.  During the Battle of Cirith Ungol Radbug had his eyes squeezed out by Shagrat
column2: killing him.  It is believed that Radbug had refused to obey him.
column4: entry "Radbug" Shagrat threatened the Orc Snaga with a similar fate if he didnt follow his orders.

column1: Category:Characters in The Lord of the Rings
